title: Effectuators 4: Sweet Albion
description: Britannia besieged!  1870: As war ravages the continent, Britain herself comes under a darker threat. The sinister Lord Bimmington moves at last, using anarchy and terror to destabilise the nation. Acting in concert with the Severed Lord, he aims to overthrow the British government and establish a horrifying new regime.  Armed with a few buckets of ectoplasm, a very strange dog and an excellent dress sense, the EFFECTUATORS must face down the ultimate evil and save Queen, country and humanity itself from disaster.  Itâ€™s time to face evil in the ultimate showdown, and knock the blighters for six!
author: Paul Kidd
